REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f2424 reute r f BC-SECURITY-PACIFIC,-PRO 04-01 0042

TEXT.TITLE: SECURITY PACIFIC, PROVIDENT NATIONAL LIFT PRIME
TEXT.BODY: Security Pacific National Bank and Provident National Bank said they increased their prime lending rates a quarter point to 7-3/4 pct. They said the move is effective immediately. Reuter
